summary: Completed FAZ 2 testing for FLULANCE platform. All backend APIs (17/17 tests) and frontend UI flows working correctly. Fixed route ordering bug in /api/influencer-stats/top-influencers endpoint.

fixed_issues.issue: Route was being matched by /{user_id} pattern due to incorrect route order
fixed_issues.fix: Moved top-influencers route before {user_id} route in server.py

critical_code_review_comments: Route ordering in FastAPI is important - specific routes like /top-influencers must be defined before parameterized routes like /{user_id}
seed_data_creation: Used existing test users and created influencer stats via API tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: FAZ 2 features are complete and working: 1) Influencer Stats system with İstatistiklerim tab showing platform stats (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Twitter), total reach, ratings, and badges. 2) Review/Rating system with Değerlendirmeler tab and review modal in Eşleşmeler tab. 3) Badge/Verification system in Admin Dashboard with Rozetler tab for awarding/removing badges (verified, top, rising, new).

influencer_stats.details: İstatistiklerim tab shows platform stats, edit modal works, POST/GET /api/influencer-stats endpoints working

reviews.details: Değerlendirmeler tab shows reviews, review modal in Eşleşmeler tab works, POST/GET /api/reviews endpoints working with validation

badges.details: Admin Rozetler tab shows badge stats, user list with award/remove buttons, badge modal works, POST/DELETE /api/admin/badges endpoints working with proper authorization
